\subsection{Function Documentation}
\index{Stat Functions@{Stat Functions}!apr\+\_\+stat@{apr\+\_\+stat}}
\index{apr\+\_\+stat@{apr\+\_\+stat}!Stat Functions@{Stat Functions}}
\subsubsection[{\texorpdfstring{apr\+\_\+stat(apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t $\ast$finfo, const char $\ast$fname, apr\+\_\+int32\+\_\+t wanted, apr\+\_\+pool\+\_\+t $\ast$pool)}{apr_stat(apr_finfo_t *finfo, const char *fname, apr_int32_t wanted, apr_pool_t *pool)}}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf apr\+\_\+status\+\_\+t} apr\+\_\+stat (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t} $\ast$}]{finfo, }
\item[{const char $\ast$}]{fname, }
\item[{apr\+\_\+int32\+\_\+t}]{wanted, }
\item[{{\bf apr\+\_\+pool\+\_\+t} $\ast$}]{pool}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\hypertarget{group__apr__file__stat_gafb0f4a4fa4545c155e20ddd8f2001c1a}{}\label{group__apr__file__stat_gafb0f4a4fa4545c155e20ddd8f2001c1a}
get the specified file\textquotesingle{}s stats. The file is specified by filename, instead of using a pre-\/opened file. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em finfo} & Where to store the information about the file, which is never touched if the call fails. \\
\hline
{\em fname} & The name of the file to stat. \\
\hline
{\em wanted} & The desired \hyperlink{structapr__finfo__t}{apr\+\_\+finfo\+\_\+t} fields, as a bit flag of A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+F\+I\+N\+F\+O\+\_\+ values \\
\hline
{\em pool} & the pool to use to allocate the new file.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
If {\ttfamily A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+I\+N\+C\+O\+M\+P\+L\+E\+TE} is returned all the fields in {\itshape finfo} may not be filled in, and you need to check the {\ttfamily finfo-\/$>$valid} bitmask to verify that what you\textquotesingle{}re looking for is there. 
\end{DoxyNote}
